sentences.en: ‘Treacle tart! Yummy!’ said Simon.
sentences.cn: “糖蜜馅饼！ 好吃！”西蒙说。

sentences.en: Because it has strong flavour, very savoury, fatty, yummy but not greasy.
sentences.cn: 由于他味道很重很咸, 很肥很好吃但不油腻.

sentences.en: Chicken salad, the chicken is very tender and yummy!
sentences.cn: 鸡肉沙拉, 鸡肉很嫩,而且美味!

sentences.en: H : Manual measurement batch feeding and machinery measurement yummy treats.
sentences.cn: H: 人工计量投料及机械计量下料.

sentences.en: Hot or cold, this salad is not only yummy, but healthy too!
sentences.cn: 不管是冷还是热, 这种沙拉不仅美味更加健康.

sentences.en: I allow myself to eat one yummy dessert a week.
sentences.cn: 那我只允许自己每周吃一次美味的甜品。

sentences.en: I had a good appetite and the food was yummy.
sentences.cn: 我胃口很好,吃了很多可口的食物.

sentences.en: I'll bet they have yummy ice cream.
sentences.cn: 我敢打赌他们有非常好吃的冰激凌。

sentences.en: It smells yummy.
sentences.cn: 它闻起来很香。

sentences.en: It was yummy.
sentences.cn: 它是美味的。

sentences.en: Just thinking of all that yummy food makes my mouth water.
sentences.cn: 光想到那些可口的食物偶就会口水直流.

sentences.en: Kim: Yummy! Can we go to the cereal section, too?
sentences.cn: 山姆: 好好吃! 我们可不可以也到谷类麦片那一区?

sentences.en: Look, I baught a lemon icecream stick, so yummy!
sentences.cn: 看, 我买了一只柠檬冰激凌棒, 可好吃呢!

sentences.en: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.cn: 做些美味的食品，比如说爆米花或一杯特别的香草茶，使你女儿更加期待阅读时光。

sentences.en: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.cn: 因此，你可以用你的聪明才智修改你对美味的面包印象，把它设为一团有毒污泥吧。

sentences.en: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.cn: 低脂全麦面包圈（或英式松饼）脂肪奶酪，然后用美味的三明治切片西红柿涂在上面。

sentences.en: The leaf fat you bought for me is very yummy.
sentences.cn: 你给我买的脂油酱可真好吃.

sentences.en: Therefore, just he told me send him only yummy food.
sentences.cn: 所以, 他现在只要我给他寄好吃的.

sentences.en: They were having a yummy buffet at twenty four dollars.
sentences.cn: 他们正在做促销,可口的自由餐只需要服二十四元.

sentences.en: This cake is really yummy.
sentences.cn: 这蛋糕真好吃。

sentences.en: Yes, thanks. It's yummy!
sentences.cn: 是的，谢谢。它是美味的！

sentences.en: Yummy hangs up the phone in disgust!
sentences.cn: Yummy厌恶地放下话筒!

sentences.en: Yummy walks into the lounge.
sentences.cn: Yummy走进客厅.

trans.tran_cn: 美味的东西；令人喜爱的东西
